org.apache.spark.scheduler

Class ShuffleMapTask

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.scheduler.Task<MapStatus>
      • org.apache.spark.scheduler.ShuffleMapTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Logging

    public class ShuffleMapTask
extends Task<MapStatus>
implements Logging
    A ShuffleMapTask divides the elements of an RDD into multiple buckets (based on a partitioner specified in the ShuffleDependency).

    See Task for more information.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
